summary: To support U.S. innovation, the federal government has invested in academic research, including at Black, tribal, and minority-serving colleges and universities. As federal research funding to all colleges and universities grew from fiscal years 2018 through 2022, the funding to these specific institutions also grew. We identified 75 federal programs that targeted funding to help these institutions do research and build their research capacity. As...
title: Federal Research: Agency Funding and Outreach to Historically Black, Tribal, and Minority-Serving Colleges and Universities
